body:
Hey guys I wanna discuss about when you become a Supporter. First of all thanks to my friends zzSPIDERMANzz he really loved my tactics to mine more blocks then craft into armour. But there is a problem when you do your strategy, that is that the chest. This might be usefull but rather be slow to get all of it. For example, placing double-chest in every thing order the helmet.chestplate,leggings, and boots even swords are too slow when you open everytime a chest. However putting a 1 double-chest all together, it is now easy to get all of it. Hope you guys understand.   

Put all chest in orders:
Advantage:  Easy to get by single.  Cannot be easy to break and getting all.
Disadvantage: Opening chest to chest. Rather be waste of woods. Breaking loses half of it.

Alltogether Chest
Advantage: Get armours,Sword very fast, no opening chest to chest. 
Disadvantage: Random items putting like crazy. Other Players will sabotage the chest and takes all of it then suicide or goes back.
The traitor will,too (TeamGriefing)
Thank You

title: Becoming a Supporter (Armour Farmer)

replies.body:
Having it in order is a lot better, 

1. Because you can see how much you have of each item easily
2. It doesn't take that much longer, you just open s chest and click somewhere in the chest.
3. In an altogether chest you have to find the right pieces which takes more time (estimated)
